text: is a Japanese politician and the current governor of Saga Prefecture located in Kyushu region of Japan.Ruling bloc-backed candidate beaten in Saga governor election , News On Japan, January 12, 2015. On August 12, 2019. the special Natsu no Saga, a documentary on the Zombie Land Saga anime (which takes place in the prefecture), featured Yamaguchi cosplaying as major character Kotaro Tatsumi.https://www.crunchyroll.com/anime-news/2019/08/15/saga-governor-loves- zomibe-land-saga-anime-cosplays-as-kotaro-tatsumi == References == Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:People from Saga Prefecture Category:People from Iruma, Saitama Category:Politicians from Saitama Prefecture Category:University of Tokyo alumni
title: Yoshinori Yamaguchi
